name: Shehan Ford
title: Senior Associate – F&A | BSc (Hons) Software Engineering
about: Results-driven Finance professional holding a BBA (Second Class Upper - 3.58 GPA) and a BSc (Hons) Software Engineering degree (Second-Class Honors). With extensive hands-on experience in financial reporting, ERP systems, and process optimization, I leverage my dual expertise to build and deploy tools that automate complex accounting workflows and drive efficiency. I am currently expanding my technical focus, with a keen interest in applying Data Science and Machine Learning techniques to enhance financial forecasting and risk modeling.

projects.title: Budget Automation Script
projects.short: Automates monthly budget consolidation and generates Excel reports.
projects.detail: Built Python scripts to parse CSV exports, reconcile budget lines and populate formatted Excel reports for management review. Reduced manual time by ~60%.

projects.title: Plant Disease CNN (Research)

projects.detail: Research-stage prototype using convolutional neural networks to classify leaf images. Prepared dataset, trained model, evaluated performance and documented next steps for deployment.
